entry.title: New release for Immich-Frame: v1.0.13.0
entry.content:
ImmichFrame goes web! üéâüéâ

With this Version of ImmichFrame, we are releasing an early version of a Webapp. Not all features are fully supported yet, but the backend of the Web-Version and the Client-Apps work the same.

Use the docker package with your existing config for easy access

What's Changed

‚ö†Ô∏è Breaking Changes

  • Use search endpoint for random assets & cache optimizations by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/143

‚ú® New Features

  • ImmichFrame goes web üéâ by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/132

üåê immichFrame WebApp

  • Auto-Reload on Web by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/141
  • Features for web by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/145
  • Web features / cleanup by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/147

üìì Documentation

  • Added Raspberry Pi OS autostart instructions by @agdamsbo in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/136

üî® Maintenance

  • Refactoring and API-Support by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/127
  • Update gitignore by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/133
  • Changed all the icons by @Blisterexe in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/140
  • Update immich API to v1.117 by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/149

New Contributors

  • @agdamsbo made their first contribution in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/136
  • @Blisterexe made their first contribution in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/140

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/compare/v1.0.12.0...v1.0.13.0

entry.title: New release for Immich-Frame: v1.0.15.0

üìì Documentation

entry.title: New release for Immich-Frame: v1.0.16.0
entry.content:
[!NOTE]
This release does not include any changes to the clientapps!

Overview

Splitview

This version introduces Splitview for portrait images. ImmichFrame displays images side by side if the display order contains two portrait images. This means that not all portrait images are displayed in a split view.

Webcalendar support

You can now display one or multiple web calendars. See documentation.

Memories

If the memories are the only asset source, ImmichFrame will display them in the correct order.

Shortcuts

Space: Pause/Play Arrow right (‚Üí): Display next asset

What's Changed

‚ö° Fixes

  • Fix: Temperature to one decimal by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/176
  • Fix: Splitscreen width by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/177
  • Fix: Font size for clock by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/179

üåê immichFrame WebApp

  • Feat: Display calendar by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/171
  • Feat: Shortcuts by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/175
  • Feat: Splitview for vertical images by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/173
  • Feat: Show memories in order by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/178
  • Feat: Implement imageLocationFormat by @3rob3 in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/180

üöÄ Other changes

  • Task: Add gradient icon variant by @damongolding in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/174

New Contributors

  • @damongolding made their first contribution in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/174

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/compare/v1.0.15.0...v1.0.16.0
